participant_1.background:
I do my laundry every week, except for the Renaissance Faire outfit.
I do not wish to discuss my parents' death.
I'd rather avoid conflict, but I'm ready to defend myself if I need to.
I am proud of my ability to get a degree in two years despite my reputation as a slacker.
I love to eat healthy foods like fruits and vegetables, as well as whole grains and lean protein.

participant_2.background:
I live in the city because I like to be close to my favorite pizza places.
i like to create art.
I'm not super close with my family, but I do enjoy spending time with them.
i like to listen to rap music.
I'm not the best at keeping up with my chores, but I try to do my laundry once a week.

content.text: Same here. What are some of your hobbies?
I like to create art, listen to rap music, and spend time with my family.
That's cool. I like to eat healthy foods, play video games, and go to the Renaissance Faire.
Have you ever made your own Renaissance Faire outfit?
No, but I'd like to try some time. I've always thought they were so cool.
Me too! I'm not very good at sewing, but I'd love to make one someday.
I'm not sure I'd be very good at it either, but it would be fun to try.
I think it would be a lot of fun too.
What's your favorite pizza place in the city?
I have to say that I love Pizza Hut.
I'm not a big fan of Pizza Hut, but I do like their pizza rolls.
They have the best pizza rolls! What's your favorite rap artist?
I like Eminem, Jay-Z, and Kendrick Lamar.
Nice! I like Kendrick Lamar too.
I'm glad we have some things in common.
